TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit UrlMembershipCondition extends System.Object implements class System.Security.ISecurityEncodable, class System.Security.ISecurityPolicyEncodable, class System.Security.Policy.IMembershipCondition

Docs.summary: Determines whether an assembly belongs to a code group by testing its URL. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The complete URL is considered, including the protocol (HTTP, HTTPS, FTP) and the file. For example, http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm is a complete URL.
URLs can be matched exactly or by a wildcard in the final position. For example, http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/* is a wildcard URL.

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the URL that determines membership.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The complete URL is considered, including the protocol (HTTP, HTTPS, FTP) and the file, for example: http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm.
URLs can be matched exactly or by a wildcard in the final position, for example: http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/*.

## Remarks The complete URL is considered, including the protocol (HTTP, HTTPS, FTP) and the file. For example, http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm is a complete URL.
URLs can be matched exactly or by a wildcard in the final position. For example, http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/* is a wildcard URL.
